field.name: SESSKEY
field.descr: session key to identify a browser session of a user

field.name: EXPIRY
field.descr: slightly redundant as it can be dynamically calculated by NOW() and MODIFIED field, but it enables forcing a fixed timeout for specific sessions.

field.name: CREATED
field.descr: a timestamp when a new session was created.

field.name: MODIFIED
field.descr: a timestamp which usually is updated when user interacts with a site to prolong the expire time.

field.name: EXPIREREF
field.descr: usually a userid or unique username of your application, the name EXPIREREF is a bit weird. Better name it USERREF?

field.name: SESSDATA
field.descr: PHP's serialized session data or encrypted serialized session data
